data.message: I'd like to come together for Haiti, Florida and the many victims of Hurricane Matthew. Will you have a Facebook filter to help raise awareness and attention for those affected by this horrific event? Its been a couple of days now. You can help raise awareness and support with your many subscribers around the world. Will you do that, Facebook?

replies.message: Hi Araba. We’ve received a lot of feedback about the desire to express support for a variety of causes, especially in the wake of tragic events such as this. We are currently testing a platform that will allow nonprofit Pages to create profile picture frames so fans can express support for a variety of social movements. -Colleen
